name: rabts space
description:
The action button is space, just shoot until you drain all the boss's health,easy right?

Also volume warning( I don't remember if I lowered it down in this build).

Have fun and please tell me if the game breaks or something ( especially if the waves stop coming and the boss is just standing there alone to be shot).

I DO NOT OWN ANY OF THE MUSIC USED IN THIS GAME, AND I WILL NOT USE THIS GAME FOR GAINING ANY PROFITS IT'S JUST A PERSONAL PROJECT FOR FUN:

first song: silence(les)  I found it here and thought that it sounded cool

second song: credit song for my death by vivivivivi
